original_title: Enter the Samurai: The Making of Samurai Cop 2
overview: Enter the Samurai is a documentary film which follows the making of the feature film "Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance". It follows the film crew and artists as they deal with clashes of generations, taste and approach to sanity while attempting to complete production of the film.
title: Enter the Samurai: The Making of Samurai Cop 2
